title: ê²°ê³¼â€‹
content: #include <string> #include <vector> #include <algorithm> using namespace std; vector<int> solution(vector<int> lottos, vector<int> win_nums) { vector<int> result(2); vector<int>::iterator it; for (size_t i = 0; i < 2; i++) { for (size_t j = 0; j < 6; j++) { it = find(win_nums.begin(), win_nums.end(), lottos[j]); if (i == 0) { // ìµœê³ ì¼ ë•Œ if (it != win_nums.end() || lottos[j] == 0) result[i]++; } else { // ìµœì €ì¼ ë•Œ if (it != win_nums.end()) result[i]++; } } if (result[i] != 0) result[i] = (result[i] - 7) * -1; else result[i] = 6; } return result; }
